stages.name: MergeDocs
stages.description: Add documentation from doc repository. This needs to be done before Flatten and renames as some documentation applies to Mixins or to elements before they are renamed

stages.name: AddExtendedAttribute
stages.description: Package up the bluetooth specific specs into a separate package

stages.name: RemoveElement
stages.description: Remove elements not used in downstream products

stages.name: RenameType
stages.description: Reworked naming convention of typedef so that the underlying type can be renamed to EventHandler. This makes the java code much easier to grok

stages.name: RenameType
stages.description: Rename EventHandler so the java code generated is nicer

stages.name: MergeDocs
stages.description: Add documentation from doc repository. We need to this here again as some documentation is defined on interfaces when it comes form a mixin
